snippet.title: Prehistoric Tales Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: http://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/prehistoric-tales.html

Bring an ancient world to vibrant life as you build and protect a fledgling settlement in Prehistoric Tales. Although you are a stranger who has no memory of your life before the day you arrived at a small village in the midst of a vast and untamed wilderness, you are nonetheless a brave and kind soul willing to tackle the challenge of safeguarding a small tribe and guiding them to a better life. Through your training, you will become a skilled builder able to raise small cities out of the ground, and a staunch warrior who can fend off the fiercest dinosaurs.
